channel.title: Other drugs(legal or ilegal)
channel.description:
what have you done or made? im quite into the chemistry side of it... sure, ive smoked a bit o tobacco, and am probably gunna do pot soon, and DEFENATELY do some salvia if i can get my hands on some. my experiences: ive been cooking up some DMT by doing an acid base extraction using some of the natural acacia around here(specifically acacia maidenii) i really wanna get my hands on some salvia divinorum seeds or maybe a bit of stem to graft or grow. after this extraction i am gunna try to make some MDMA, which is a REALLY hard extraction/synthesis.
note: one of the driving forces behind me making these is because i want to experience them as safely as possible, and what could be more safe then cooking them yourself?
i do NOT in any way recommend the taking of drugs by anyone under the age of 18. however once you hit 18, you are probably mature enough to make an informed decision.
if you do try it when you are 18, i suggest you make your own... its really facinating stuff.
if i were to reccommend you in your adventures: start off trying to make DMT. its perhaps the EASIEST extraction i have ever seen, period. however you might find a bit of troube finding the necessary ingredient if you live outside autralia.
note: i do NOT condone drug use in any way shape or form, however as this is a discussion forum, i believe we can have a civilized discussion without anything illegal happening note: discussion of drugs is not illegal as long as you do not tell people to make them, or instruct them how to.

item.title: Other drugs(legal or ilegal)
item.dc:creator: @elementalelf elementalelf
item.description:
@elementalelf wrote:

i’ve been having alot of trouble with my latest DMT extraction, normal acid/base extraction, however i was using a different plant, acacia podalyriifolia as opposed to acacia maidenii. i havnt been getting ANY product whatsoever, even when i heat up the aqueous solution to around 60* in the microwave before adding the naptha(heat = more DMT binding to naptha)
i used 1kg of fresh bark, but im starting to think there is no DMT in this plant at all, im especially skeptical because wikipedia is the only site i can see that says it contains up to 2% DMT

Read full topic

item.title: Other drugs(legal or ilegal)
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Actually, saying that they’re stupid was a bit harsh of me. People’s homes don’t have quite the same ventilation as a lab, nor the equipment they have. A lot of people don’t realise quite how far those fumes spread, and that it dosen’t take much to set 'em off - so they may be smart enough to not smoke, but then their boiler comes on or whatever.

Don’t do drugs kids, and if you do, buy them from your friendly neighbourhood meth addict.

Read full topic

item.title: Other drugs(legal or ilegal)
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

That is generally the problem, people having no idea of what they are doing.

Also elementalelf, I don’t view this discussion as ‘heated’, it’s just a discussion, carry on.

Read full topic

item.title: Other drugs(legal or ilegal)
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

[quote=“elementalelf, post:50, topic:143831”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=197257.msg1785576#msg1785576 date=1190963295]

moparisthebest: making meth is almost as easy as making DMT, a monkey could do it given enough practice.

I still wouldn’t trust anything from a monkey. And if that was true why have a few meth labs around here went up in huge balls of fire? If you make it yourself you have only yourself to blame, I just think buying it from others is a bad idea.
[/quote]

i cant really think of anything flamable in a methlamphetamine… however i think this conversation itself is getting a bit too heated, i dont mean to be rude in any way, sorry mopar :S[/quote]

Generally, the labs explode because people are too stupid to handle volatile solvents and don’t realise that when you’re playing with stuff like ether, the fumes settle. So, they put the jug of ether in the cupboard, and then immediately have a cigarette.

Read full topic

item.title: Other drugs(legal or ilegal)
item.dc:creator: @Silver_Lining Silver Lining
item.description:
@Silver_Lining wrote:

I’ve only done diphenhydramine, DXM, and nutmeg, personally. Nutmeg didn’t work, DXM was great, and diphenhydramine was alright. The up about diphenhydramine is the great light-headed feeling one gets from using it which I love, but it also got me into a shitload of trouble with my parents. My DXM trip was basically me doing some interpretive dancing and writing poetry, along with that great light-headed feeling. Nutmeg just made me barf. So I’d recommend the DXM, suggest diphen to the desperate, and give nutmeg to the people I want to see unhappy.

Read full topic

item.title: Other drugs(legal or ilegal)
item.dc:creator: @elementalelf elementalelf
item.description:
@elementalelf wrote:

robocz: they still use psuedoephidrine in cough medicine, i did an extraction with “normal”(not the stuff we get from the chem lab) cough medicine the other day, still works perfectly.

mopman: the antihistamines are polar, so they dont bind to the solvent when washing it.

moparisthebest: making meth is almost as easy as making DMT, a monkey could do it given enough practice.

Read full topic

item.title: Other drugs(legal or ilegal)
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:44, topic:143831”][quote author=elementalelf link=topic=197257.msg1781870#msg1781870 date=1190823404]
re: MITB post:
that is the biggest cop out i have ever heard, and i hear it really often.
it gets me really angry when people say “oh, they cut it with ajax, they use drain cleaner blah blah blah”
i do use 2 seperate types of drain cleaner, on oppisite ends of the spectrum(PH spectrum)
i use HCL, hydrocloric acid, also known as muriatic acid, a good brick cleaner and drain cleaner.
and caustic soda, another good drain cleaner.
yet there is NONE of this in the end product.
you seperate the product from the broth using a non polar solvent, in my case, i use colemans fuel, aka lighter fluid, aka naptha.

the naptha contains the product, and floats to the top of the mixture, i pour it through a tap system to drain away the Acid/base solution(its actually basic at the time, PH of about 11)
so really, all you are left with is naptha and DMT.
the naptha evaporates(leaving NO residue, no impurities) leaving the DMT crystals in the bottom.
so although you ARE using drain cleaner, there is NO way you can possibly inhale it.
[/quote]

You might not leave none of the drain cleaner, hydrochloric acid or rat poison in the finished product after you are done. But around here the people that make meth generally don’t even have a high school education, I can’t say I would trust them with my life.

I didn’t read the list of contents off of a website or anything, but as a cashier in a grocery store we had to watch out for people buying those ingredients and report them. ;)[/quote]
thats [retty funny, them telling you to do that lol.

Read full topic

that is the biggest cop out i have ever heard, and i hear it really often.
it gets me really angry when people say “oh, they cut it with ajax, they use drain cleaner blah blah blah”
i do use 2 seperate types of drain cleaner, on oppisite ends of the spectrum(PH spectrum)
i use HCL, hydrocloric acid, also known as muriatic acid, a good brick cleaner and drain cleaner.
and caustic soda, another good drain cleaner.
yet there is NONE of this in the end product.
you seperate the product from the broth using a non polar solvent, in my case, i use colemans fuel, aka lighter fluid, aka naptha.

the naptha contains the product, and floats to the top of the mixture, i pour it through a tap system to drain away the Acid/base solution(its actually basic at the time, PH of about 11)
so really, all you are left with is naptha and DMT.
the naptha evaporates(leaving NO residue, no impurities) leaving the DMT crystals in the bottom.
so although you ARE using drain cleaner, there is NO way you can possibly inhale it.[/quote]

You might not leave none of the drain cleaner, hydrochloric acid or rat poison in the finished product after you are done. But around here the people that make meth generally don’t even have a high school education, I can’t say I would trust them with my life.

item.title: Other drugs(legal or ilegal)
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Yeah, not to mention that Sodium Hydroxide is also used in various soaps and even in the processing of food, and nobody ever goes “OMG YOUR TOMATOES CONTAIN DRAIN CLEANER, DON’T EAT THEM”.

It’s just FUD largely spread by organisations like Freevibe in a last ditch attempt to win their futile “drug war”.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @elementalelf elementalelf
item.description:
@elementalelf wrote:

re: MITB post:
that is the biggest cop out i have ever heard, and i hear it really often.
it gets me really angry when people say “oh, they cut it with ajax, they use drain cleaner blah blah blah”
i do use 2 seperate types of drain cleaner, on oppisite ends of the spectrum(PH spectrum)
i use HCL, hydrocloric acid, also known as muriatic acid, a good brick cleaner and drain cleaner.
and caustic soda, another good drain cleaner.
yet there is NONE of this in the end product.
you seperate the product from the broth using a non polar solvent, in my case, i use colemans fuel, aka lighter fluid, aka naptha.

the naptha contains the product, and floats to the top of the mixture, i pour it through a tap system to drain away the Acid/base solution(its actually basic at the time, PH of about 11)
so really, all you are left with is naptha and DMT.
the naptha evaporates(leaving NO residue, no impurities) leaving the DMT crystals in the bottom.
so although you ARE using drain cleaner, there is NO way you can possibly inhale it.

item.title: Other drugs(legal or ilegal)
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I think it is good that all of these < 15 year olds think drugs are bad and would never use them. Certainly if you were to ask me if I would ever consider smoking weed 6 years ago when I was 15 years old I would have said the same thing, no way. Drugs are bad mmmk?

However, after I turned 17 and started drinking (legal drinking age here is 21), and then when 18 got introduced to weed it isn’t nearly as bad as schools and ‘the man’ would have you believe. It still should not be done at an early age though. Personally I prefer alcohol over marijuana any day, in fact I don’t really like weed much at all, I only smoke sometimes after I am completely wasted already.

As to other drugs, I still think they are a bad idea. Especially drugs like meth, have any of you seen the ingredient list for meth? It is entirely made up of parts that could each kill you separately, not to mention it is extremely hazardous to ‘cook up’ releasing toxic and explosive gases. In fact around the area I live quite a few people have blown themselves up trying to cook up some meth, and the side effects seem just as bad or worse than cocaine or heroin.

Bottom line, any drug that leaves me with the potential to resort to sucking dick for ‘one more high’ I stay clear of.

Read full topic

item.title: Other drugs(legal or ilegal)
item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

Mopman:

It’s a difference of opinion. Your opinion is that “drugs kill you”. My opinion is that “irresponsible use of drugs can kill you”. Just like irresponsible use of cars can kill you, but responsible use of cars can be fun and useful.

true, imo, tobacco is the worst, it gives you cancer much easier, while alchol could kill you if you over dose.

Read full topic
